title: Tom Ross
deck: I moved from Glasgow to York in 1980 and was involved in the prayer fellowship that became a church that is now known as Gateway. I have been married to Jill for over 34 years and have two grown-up children and three grandchildren. I work as a data analyst but my heart is for people rather than figures. Jill and I lead the prayer team and are responsible for marriage ministries in Gateway. We are also part of the Couples in Crisis team working with Family Matters York.
